comments:
Indexing the following K&R code leads to an endless recursion.

typedef long time_t;

void (foo)(timep)
	const time_t * const timep;
{
	struct tm tmp;

	bar(timep, &tmp);
}

int (bar)(timep, tmp)
	const time_t * const	timep;
	struct tm * tmp;
{
	return 0;
}
